name: High Noon
description: Bullets spray between wicked slash attacks.
Zwischen bösartigen Schnittangriffen werden Kugeln verschossen.
languages.name: Mittagsstunde

description: Rafales de balles entrecoupées de vicieux coups de lame.
languages.name: Moment de Vérité

description: Raffiche di proiettili intervallate da fendenti letali.
languages.name: High Noon

description: 강력한 베기 공격 사이로 총탄을 퍼뜨리는 공격입니다.
languages.name: 하이 눈

description: Pulverización de balas entre perversos ataques cortantes.
languages.name: Pleno mediodía

description: 在连续的凶狠斩击之间开火射击
languages.name: 正午

description: 凶悪な斬撃に重ねて弾丸一閃。
languages.name: High Noon

description: Rajada de balas entre cortes giratórios incríveis.
languages.name: High Noon

description: 在連續的凶狠斬擊之間開火射擊
languages.name: 日正當中

description: สาดกระสุนระหว่างที่ไล่ฟันอย่างบ้าคลั่ง
languages.name: High Noon
